  • Method Details

    • executeUpdate

      public static void executeUpdate(Statement statement, String query) throws SQLException
      A method that implements the `.executeUpdate()` method to bring alterations to a Table. Via this method, we can perform the following SQL functionality: (1) INSERT INTO TABLE_NAME . . ., (2) UPDATE TABLE_NAME . . ., and (3) DELETE FROM TABLE_NAME . . .
      Parameters:
      query - The SQL query to be executed.
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Could not execute the SQL query for some reason. See the error Stack Trace.

    • performSelectPrjNoPrjName

      public static void performSelectPrjNoPrjName(Statement statement, String query) throws SQLException
      A function that displays all the Project Numbers and Project Names from the PROJECTS table in the format of prj_no -> prj_name.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.
      query - A SELECT query on the PROJECTS table.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • isolateAndPrintPrjRow

      public static void isolateAndPrintPrjRow(Statement statement, String identifier) throws SQLException
      A function that prints all the details of one specific project, indicated by identifier, to the console.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.
      identifier - A String variable which is either the Project Number or the Project Name used in the SQL filtering.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • isolateAndPrintArchtRow

      public static void isolateAndPrintArchtRow(Statement statement, String archtName) throws SQLException
      A function that displays all the details of one specific Architect as indicated by the archtName variable.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.
      archtName - The Name of the Architect. This is used in the SQL filtering to isolate one row.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • isolateAndPrintCustRow

      public static void isolateAndPrintCustRow(Statement statement, String fName, String lName) throws SQLException
      A function that displays all the details of one specific customer, as indicated by the `fname` and `lname` parameters.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.
      fName - The first name of the customer. This is used in the SQL filtering WHERE statement.
      lName - The Last Name of the customer. This is used in the SQL filtering WHERE statement.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • isolateAndPrintContrRow

      public static void isolateAndPrintContrRow(Statement statement, String contrName) throws SQLException
      A function that displays all the details of one specific Contractor, as indicated by the `contrName` parameter.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.
      contrName - The name of the contractor used in the SQL filtering WHERE clause.
      Throws:
      SQLException
